headline: Bond Market Momentum Shifts Bears’ Way as Sell Signals Flash
summary: Meanwhile, jobs data and a higher-than-expected inflation reading suggest the bar is high for further Fed rate cuts in the coming months.  “We are underweight US Treasuries and happy to run those positions,” said James Athey, a portfolio manager at Marlborough Investment Management.  Treasuries’ advance earlier in the month flummoxed traders who had been wagering that Trump’s desire to run the economy hot heading to the mid-term election would keep the bond market under pressure.
